titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ, 3. Ianuar. 1641. It is this day ordered upon the question, by the Commons House of Parliament; that if any persons whatsoever, shall come to the lodgings of any member of his House, and there doe offer to seale the trunkes, doores or papers of any members of this House, or to seize upon their persons; ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Bates in the old Bailie,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
